title: Behavioral Biology
description: An introduction to the study of the principles of behavior of all kinds of organisms, from microbes to mammals.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)) or (BIOL 1520 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1521 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (BIOS 1108 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1108L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1208 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1208L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D))
